headline: Trimble Introduces Trimble Materials to Enable Construction Material Procurement and Management
summary: Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) announced today the launch of Trimble Materials, an end-to-end purchasing, inventory and accounts payable software solution. It is designed to help contractors gain control over material costs with enhanced budget and inventory tracking. Through its office and mobile applications, the solution connects the office, field teams, warehouse teams and suppliers to centralize and streamline the contractor's entire purchasing and materials management process.
